categories: Category:Captains and commanders of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Jakker was a male Human Commander of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he served as a bodyguard to newly-appointed Dark Council member Darth Zhorrid on Korriban. During a meeting with Cipher Nine, Zhorrid ordered Jakker and other bodyguards to kill her visitor, but they failed and were all killed instead.
Commander Jakker appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial Agent class mission on Korriban.
